meanings.definition: A large marine fish found in South African waters, also known as kob.
meanings.sent1: The kabeljou swam gracefully in the ocean.
meanings.sent2: We enjoyed a delicious meal of grilled kabeljou.
meanings.sent3: The kabeljou told a fishy joke that made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as elusive as a kabeljou in the deep sea.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering scales of the kabeljou sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: The flesh of the kabeljou fish, often used for cooking.
meanings.sent1: The chef prepared a tasty dish using kabeljou.
meanings.sent2: The market sold fresh kabeljou fillets.
meanings.sent3: The kabeljou fillet danced in the sizzling pan.
meanings.sent4: Her cooking skills were as versatile as kabeljou meat.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the grilled kabeljou filled the kitchen.
